title: Im new and someone told me i should have gotten 400 but idk if i did or not
body: i started playing 6 months ago and i had to stop when i was lvl 6 when i finally was able to get back on i only had 140 rp instead of 400 and i didnt buy anything with it (i even checked my purchase history) even if i did buy someone with it i would have refunded it. what do i do :/? http://puu.sh/d7sCj/f0c78c3225.jpghttp://puu.sh/d7sCj/f0c78c3225.jpg

replies.body:
my friend had this problem too

try sending a support ticket, they should be able to give the remaining to 400
oh glad im not the only one tnx

Spend your refund credits very wisely young one. That is my advice. All three of my refund credits I used I have re-bought and play those champions now anyways. As for your dilemma with the seemingly lost RP I have no idea, maybe send in a support ticket? Good luck on getting this resolved.
